#!/bin/bash
# Enhanced SSL-Setup Script mit vollst√§ndigem Certbot-Output-Logging
# Version: 3.0 - CERTBOT DEBUGGING KOMPLETT

set -e

# Debug-Konfiguration aus Umgebungsvariablen
DEBUG="${SSL_DEBUG:-false}"
VERBOSE="${SSL_VERBOSE:-false}"
SSL_DOMAIN="${SSL_DOMAIN:-localhost}"
SSL_EMAIL="${SSL_EMAIL:-admin@localhost}"
SSL_METHOD="${SSL_METHOD:-selfsigned}"
SSL_KEY_SIZE="${SSL_KEY_SIZE:-4096}"
SSL_CERT_VALIDITY="${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY:-365}"
LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT="${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT:-80}"
FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION="${FORCE_DOMAIN_VALIDATION:-false}"
CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN="${CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN:-}"

# Farben f√ºr Output
RED='\033[0;31m'

YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
MAGENTA='\033[0;35m'
NC='\033[0m'

# Enhanced Logging-Funktionen
log_info() { 
    echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $@"

        echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'): [INFO] $@" >> ssl/ssl-debug.log

}

log_error() { 
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $@" >&2
    if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then
        echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'): [ERROR] $@" >> ssl/ssl-debug.log
    fi
}

log_warn() {

    if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then

}

log_debug() {

}

log_success() {

    if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then

# Let's Encrypt mit vollst√§ndigem Output-Logging (KORRIGIERT)
create_letsencrypt_cert() {
    log_info "üåê Let's Encrypt Setup mit erweiterten Debug-Informationen..."
    
    # 1. DNS-Aufl√∂sung pr√ºfen
    log_info "Pr√ºfe DNS-Aufl√∂sung f√ºr ${SSL_DOMAIN}..."
    if command -v nslookup >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        if nslookup "${SSL_DOMAIN}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            log_success "‚úÖ DNS-Aufl√∂sung erfolgreich"
        else
            log_warn "‚ö†Ô∏è DNS-Aufl√∂sung fehlgeschlagen f√ºr ${SSL_DOMAIN}"
            log_debug "DNS-Test: $(nslookup "${SSL_DOMAIN}" 2>&1 || echo 'FAIL')"
        fi
    fi
    
    # 2. Port-Verf√ºgbarkeit pr√ºfen
    log_info "Pr√ºfe Port ${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT} f√ºr Let's Encrypt..."
    local port_check=""
    if command -v netstat >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        port_check=$(netstat -tlnp 2>/dev/null | grep ":${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT} " || echo "")
    elif command -v ss >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        port_check=$(ss -tlnp 2>/dev/null | grep ":${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT} " || echo "")
    fi
    
    if [ -n "$port_check" ]; then
        log_error "‚ùå Port ${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT} ist bereits belegt:"
        log_error "$port_check"
        log_warn "üîÑ Fallback zu Self-Signed..."
        export SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
        exec "$0"
        exit 0
    else
        log_success "‚úÖ Port ${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT} ist verf√ºgbar"
    fi
    
    # 3. Externe Erreichbarkeit testen
    log_info "Teste externe Erreichbarkeit..."
    if command -v curl >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        external_test=$(curl -s --connect-timeout 10 -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "http://${SSL_DOMAIN}" 2>/dev/null || echo "FAIL")
        if [ "$external_test" != "FAIL" ] && [ "$external_test" != "000" ]; then
            log_success "‚úÖ Domain ist extern erreichbar (HTTP Status: $external_test)"
        else
            log_warn "‚ö†Ô∏è Domain ist m√∂glicherweise nicht extern erreichbar"
            log_debug "HTTP-Test Result: $external_test"
        fi
    fi
    
    # 4. Certbot Installation pr√ºfen
    if ! command -v certbot >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        log_error "‚ùå Certbot nicht gefunden"
        log_info "Versuche Certbot-Installation..."
        
        if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            log_debug "Installiere Certbot via apt..."
            apt-get update >/dev/null 2>&1
            if apt-get install -y certbot python3-certbot-nginx >/dev/null 2>&1; then
                log_success "‚úÖ Certbot Installation erfolgreich"
            else
                log_error "‚ùå Certbot Installation fehlgeschlagen"
                log_warn "üîÑ Fallback zu Self-Signed..."
                export SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
                exec "$0"
                exit 0
            fi
        else
            log_error "‚ùå Kein unterst√ºtzter Package Manager f√ºr Certbot-Installation"
            log_warn "üîÑ Fallback zu Self-Signed..."
            export SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
            exec "$0"
            exit 0
        fi
    else
        certbot_version=$(certbot --version 2>&1 | head -1 || echo "Version unbekannt")
        log_debug "Certbot verf√ºgbar: $certbot_version"
    fi
    
    # 5. Certbot-Befehl vorbereiten
    log_info "Bereite Let's Encrypt Befehl vor..."
    local certbot_cmd="certbot certonly"
    certbot_cmd+=" --standalone"
    certbot_cmd+=" --non-interactive"
    certbot_cmd+=" --agree-tos"
    certbot_cmd+=" --email '${SSL_EMAIL}'"
    certbot_cmd+=" --domains '${SSL_DOMAIN}'"
    certbot_cmd+=" --key-type rsa"
    certbot_cmd+=" --rsa-key-size ${SSL_KEY_SIZE}"
    certbot_cmd+=" --preferred-challenges http"
    certbot_cmd+=" --http-01-port ${LETS_ENCRYPT_PORT}"
    
    if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then
        certbot_cmd+=" --verbose"
    fi
    
    log_debug "Certbot-Befehl: $certbot_cmd"
    
    # 6. Certbot ausf√ºhren mit VOLLST√ÑNDIGEM Output-Logging (KORRIGIERT)
    log_info "F√ºhre Certbot aus..."
    
    # Tempor√§re Datei f√ºr Output
    local certbot_output="/tmp/certbot_output_$$.log"
    local certbot_success=false
    
    # Certbot ausf√ºhren und Output in Datei + Live-Anzeige
    if eval "$certbot_cmd" > "$certbot_output" 2>&1; then
        certbot_success=true
        log_success "‚úÖ Certbot erfolgreich ausgef√ºhrt"
    else
        certbot_success=false
        log_error "‚ùå Certbot fehlgeschlagen"
    fi
    
    # VOLLST√ÑNDIGEN Output anzeigen und loggen
    if [ -f "$certbot_output" ]; then
        log_debug "=== VOLLST√ÑNDIGER CERTBOT OUTPUT ==="
        while IFS= read -r line; do
            log_debug "Certbot: $line"
            
            # Wichtige Nachrichten auch im normalen Output
            if echo "$line" | grep -E "(Successfully received|Congratulations|IMPORTANT NOTES|Certificate received)" >/dev/null; then
                log_success "$line"
            elif echo "$line" | grep -E "(Error|Failed|Unable|Problem|Challenge failed|Timeout|Connection refused)" >/dev/null; then
                log_error "Certbot Error: $line"
            elif echo "$line" | grep -E "(Obtaining|Performing|Waiting|Requesting)" >/dev/null; then
                log_info "Certbot: $line"
            fi
        done < "$certbot_output"
        log_debug "=== ENDE CERTBOT OUTPUT ==="
        
        # Aufr√§umen
        rm -f "$certbot_output"
    fi
    
    # 7. Zertifikate kopieren
    if [ "$certbot_success" = "true" ]; then
        local letsencrypt_path="/etc/letsencrypt/live/${SSL_DOMAIN}"
        log_debug "Suche Zertifikate in: $letsencrypt_path"
        
        if [ -d "$letsencrypt_path" ]; then
            log_info "Kopiere Let's Encrypt Zertifikate..."
            
            if [ -f "$letsencrypt_path/fullchain.pem" ] && [ -f "$letsencrypt_path/privkey.pem" ]; then
                cp "$letsencrypt_path/fullchain.pem" ssl/fullchain.pem
                cp "$letsencrypt_path/privkey.pem" ssl/privkey.pem
                
                log_success "‚úÖ Let's Encrypt Zertifikat erfolgreich kopiert"
                
                # Zertifikat-Details loggen
                if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then
                    cert_info=$(openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -subject -dates -noout 2>/dev/null || echo "Cert-Info nicht verf√ºgbar")
                    log_debug "Zertifikat-Info: $cert_info"
                fi
                
                return 0
            else
                log_error "‚ùå Zertifikat-Dateien nicht in $letsencrypt_path gefunden"
                log_debug "Verzeichnis-Inhalt: $(ls -la "$letsencrypt_path" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Leer oder nicht lesbar')"
                log_warn "üîÑ Fallback zu Self-Signed..."
                export SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
                exec "$0"
                exit 0
            fi
        else
            log_error "‚ùå Let's Encrypt Zertifikat-Verzeichnis nicht gefunden: $letsencrypt_path"
            
            # Debugging: Zeige verf√ºgbare Verzeichnisse
            if [ -d "/etc/letsencrypt/live" ]; then
                log_debug "Verf√ºgbare Domains in /etc/letsencrypt/live:"
                ls -la /etc/letsencrypt/live/ 2>/dev/null | while read line; do
                    log_debug "  $line"
                done
            else
                log_debug "/etc/letsencrypt/live existiert nicht"
            fi
            
            # Pr√ºfe auch alternative Pfade
            for alt_path in "/etc/letsencrypt/archive/${SSL_DOMAIN}" "/var/lib/letsencrypt" "/home/letsencrypt"; do
                if [ -d "$alt_path" ]; then
                    log_debug "Alternative Pfad gefunden: $alt_path"
                    ls -la "$alt_path" 2>/dev/null | while read line; do
                        log_debug "  $alt_path: $line"
                    done
                fi
            done
            
            log_warn "üîÑ Fallback zu Self-Signed..."
            export SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
            exec "$0"
            exit 0
        fi
    else
        log_error "‚ùå Certbot war nicht erfolgreich - Fallback zu Self-Signed"
        export SSL_METHOD="selfsigned"
        exec "$0"
        exit 0
    fi
}

# Self-Signed Zertifikat erstellen
create_selfsigned_cert() {
    log_info "üîê Erstelle Self-Signed Zertifikat mit erweiterten Browser-Kompatibilit√§t..."
    
    # Browser-kompatible OpenSSL-Konfiguration
    cat > ssl/openssl.cnf << EOF
[req]
distinguished_name = req_distinguished_name
req_extensions = v3_req
prompt = no

[req_distinguished_name]
C = DE
ST = NRW
L = Sprockhovel
O = DB Backup Tool
CN = ${SSL_DOMAIN}

[v3_req]
keyUsage = keyEncipherment, dataEncipherment, digitalSignature
extendedKeyUsage = serverAuth, clientAuth
subjectAltName = @alt_names

[alt_names]
DNS.1 = ${SSL_DOMAIN}
DNS.2 = localhost
DNS.3 = *.${SSL_DOMAIN}
IP.1 = 127.0.0.1
IP.2 = ::1
EOF

    # Zertifikat erstellen mit korrekten Browser-Extensions
    if openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:${SSL_KEY_SIZE} \
        -keyout ssl/privkey.pem \
        -out ssl/fullchain.pem \
        -days ${SSL_CERT_VALIDITY} \
        -nodes \
        -config ssl/openssl.cnf \
        -extensions v3_req 2>/dev/null; then
        
        log_success "‚úÖ Self-Signed Zertifikat erfolgreich erstellt"
        
        # Aufr√§umen
        rm -f ssl/openssl.cnf
        
        # Validierung
        if openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -text -noout | grep -q "digitalSignature"; then
            log_success "‚úÖ Zertifikat mit korrekter Browser-Kompatibilit√§t erstellt"
            if [ "$DEBUG" = "true" ]; then
                cert_info=$(openssl x509 -in ssl/fullchain.pem -subject -dates -noout 2>/dev/null || echo "Cert-Info nicht verf√ºgbar")
                log_debug "Zertifikat-Info: $cert_info"
            fi
        else
            log_warn "‚ö†Ô∏è Zertifikat m√∂glicherweise nicht vollst√§ndig browser-kompatibel"
        fi
        
        return 0
    else
        log_error "‚ùå Self-Signed Zertifikat konnte nicht erstellt werden"
        return 1
    fi
}
